attributes.action: justify, and do something about, the fact that public sector pay restraint seems to apply ONLY to those on the lowest pay rates!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Maybe it is necessary, for the sake of the economy, for public sector staff to accept restraints in their pay increases.  I find it very difficult, however, to understand why we never hear of staff at MANAGERIAL levels being expected to show such restraint when it comes to THEIR pay increases.   If anyone should surely it is people on THAT level, who can afford it, not those paid the lowest rate.
